hooks.prompt: Analyze the conversation to determine if a research artifact was produced. Look for: PROBLEM-STATEMENT (suggest /research-brief), research-brief.xml (suggest user execute prompts then /consolidate-research), consolidated-report.xml (suggest /compare-options for strategic decisions). Respond with {"ok": true} if no suggestion needed, or {"ok": false, "reason": "Suggested next step: [suggestion]"} if workflow should continue.

Check if any research output was produced with confidence below 0.85. Look for confidence scores, epistemic labels showing SPECULATIVE or UNKNOWN, or explicit low-confidence markers. Respond with {"ok": true} if confidence is acceptable, or {"ok": false, "reason": "Low confidence detected: [details]. Consider continuing research or flagging findings."} if confidence is concerning.
